customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Sometimes, our convoys will be intercepted by the Fatui while transporting goods. I doubt that they lack supplies, so I can only think that they must have some other motive for doing such things...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When every Action Phase begins, all your characters gain 1 Energy.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Starting Lineup:</color>

customize.name: Agente dei Fatui di Pyro
customize.desc:
Agente Lama del regolamento

"Non si scappa dai debiti, che si sia vivi o altrimenti"

customize.name: Sacerdotessa degli specchi
customize.desc:
Emissaria dello specchio, Sacerdotessa di Snezhnaya

Tutti i segreti verranno nascosti all'interno dello specchio della luminosit√† sfolgorante...

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
